article_title: Clash Over Darden Board Will Be Measure of Activist Clout
article_text:
An activist investor's uncommon maneuver to overthrow the entire board of Darden Restaurants Inc. will test shareholders' appetite for aggressive action by dissident hedge funds.

On Thursday, Starboard Value LP said it would nominate its own candidates to replace all 12 directors from the board of Darden, which owns Red Lobster, Olive Garden and other chains.

A New York-based hedge fund, Starboard has taken a 6.2% stake in...
